Bermuda Weather Service bụ ọrụ ihu igwe nkè mba Bermuda
Ọ na-enye amụma ihu igwe ọha, nke mmiri, nke okpomọkụ na nke ụgbọ elu yana ịdọ áká ná ntị na ọrụ climatolological
Ọrụ ahụ bịdọrọ ọrụ n'okpuru nkwekọrịta site na Ngalaba Ọrụ Ụgbọelu, Ministry of Transport and Tourism, n'afọ 1995
Tupu nke ahụ, ọrụ ihu igwe nke agwaetiti ahụ sitere na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri US na agwaetiti ahụ.
